name: wasteland-japan
description: ](https://dannifaze-code.github.io/wasteland-japan/) ## Controls - Click game to lock mouse - WASD: move - Mouse: look - Space: jump - Shift: sprint - Ctrl: crouch - C: toggle 1st/3rd person - 1/2/3: weapon slots - R: reload - E: interact / loot - I: inventory - Esc: pause / unlock mouse
